attributes.action: Stop breed specific legislation and banned breeds and liscence dog owners
attributes.background:
Remove the banned breed list and allow all breeds of dog to be owned but issue dog ownership liscences.
In which people should prove they are capable of proper dog ownership, training, control and care.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652050
